programme.title: Lost Romance(M) Ep78
programme.desc: Xiao-En Zheng is an ordinary editor for romance novels who always dreams that one day a rich hunk would come and save her. One of her enjoyable times is to peek out the window to see Tian-Xing He, who is a CEO working in the next building. Her world changes completely when an accident occurs. She time travels into her novel. Not knowing where she is, she sees Tian-Xing He walking towards her.

programme.title: Player in Kaohsiung (M) Ep5253
programme.desc: The name Kaohsiung has entered into a century of history since it has been renamed from Da Gou. This year, the National Day fireworks will be held again in Kaohsiung after 20 years passed. SETI has specially produced a new travelogue for Kaohsiung, leading the audience to visit the most popular, charming, and unique places in Kaohsiung. Through the lens, the century-old glory of Kaohsiungs [One-Hundred] is presented profoundly. The new season of "Player in Kaohsiung" invites many hosts and celebrities, including Yao Yao, Chang Chin Lan, Daniel Chen, David Wu, Ada Chang, Fay Wu, and Kua Kua, visit the 38 administrative districts of Kaohsiung to explore the sensational stories of the people in the alleys, deeply explore the professional spirit of the Greater Kaohsiung area, the traditions and customs of the aboriginal people, the living beside the farms and ports, and the humanism nurtured by Kaohsiungs century-old history.

programme.title: Have A Nice Dream (M) Ep113
programme.desc: Five young professionals with different life skills, team up for two days and one night trip, leading the audiance to explore the good life of nature and the beauty of the land of Taiwan.

programme.title: Stories In Taiwan (T) Ep1051
programme.desc: In a playful and relaxed style, the host went deep into the corners of various towns and villages in Taiwan, looking for the uniqueness, introduced the special local customs and traditions.

programme.title: Battle Tour(M) Ep16
programme.desc: Brand new concept of a travelogue show! Hosts will be using a different perspectives and knowledge to show you the latest tourist spots to check in!

programme.title: Show Biz (M) Ep865866
programme.desc: Every second counts in "Show Biz" to bring you with the most High Speed star news, exciting live shows and performers interviews.

programme.title: The Borderless World (M) Ep688
programme.desc: Journalist with an infallible nose for a story is leading the audience to explore the world. Exploring how people from different cultures overcome the challenges with collective wisdom.

programme.title: Mr.Player (M) Ep464
programme.desc: Depending on the locations of the missions, Jacky Wu, the leader of the home team, invites various celebrities to take on challenges and bring you excitement every week.

programme.title: Happy Enemy(M) Ep89
programme.desc: Pei-Pei Wu and Yu-Hsuan Lee have been comparing with each other since childhood. They had a crush on each other but later became rivals because of an accident. They both wished each other would disappear from their lives; however, they are neighbors. Pei-Pei and Yu-Hsuan have been fighting, yet they inevitably fell into the destined love with each other. If fighting against each other is a way of communication and caring, then these quarrelsome lovers are getting closer and growing together. When they gradually start to let go of their competitive attitude that is full of hostility, they even start to click with each other!

programme.title: I'm Livin' It
programme.desc: Once a successful banker, Bowen now spends his nights in a 24-hour fast food joint where he meets a group of homeless people. Together they strive to get themselves out of rock bottom.

programme.title: Enter the Fat Dragon
programme.desc: Donnie Yen plays a Hong Kong police officer who is highly skilled in martial arts but balloons to more than 200 pounds after his fianc left him. His boss can only assign simple tasks to him like escorting a criminal to Japan, but can he complete it?

programme.title: All's Well End's Well 2012
programme.desc: This beloved slapstick comedy series continues as it follows four couples who meet through a dating website. Four men go on a heroic mission to help four women and wind up experiencing a series of mishaps.

programme.title: The Lost Bladesman
programme.desc: An epic historic adventure set during the turbulent times of the Three Kingdoms. Cao Cao attempts to enlist Guan Yun Chang into his forces, but Guan is loyal to his sworn brother Liu Bei, who is also Caos enemy. As Guan tries to rescue Liu Beis concubine from Cao, he is forced to fight his way through. Can he succeed in the end?

programme.title: The Grand Grandmaster
programme.desc: Ma Fei Lung, a Chinese martial arts grandmaster, lost everything after he is floored by a former female boxing champion, Chan Tsang. The relevant video was posted on social media and he became the laughing stock of everyone. To reclaim his reputation, Fei Lung challenges Chan Tsang to a rematch. Who will be the winner?

programme.title: Saving General Yang
programme.desc: The Khitan army takes revenge for a past massacre by abducting General Yang Ye and setting up a deadly trap for the seven Yang brothers. Led by the eldest son, the seven brothers set out with a small band of fighters to bring their father home.

programme.title: The Wandering Earth II
programme.desc: In this prequel, humans build enormous engines on the Earths surface to find a new home when the sun is burning out. In the dangerous universe, a group of young people has to step forward once again to fight in the critical battle to save the Earth.

programme.title: Men Suddenly in Love
programme.desc: Five high-school alumni - councilor Ng Yuk Yan (Eric Tsang), actor Cheung Chau Wan (Jim Chim), gynecologist Fu Mo Sum (Wong Jing), feng shui master Szeto Kei Fung (Chapman To), and dance coach Charlie Lam (Det Dik) - get together to throw a birthday party for their respected teacher Mr. Chu (Richard Ng), who enlightened them about the birds and the bees. Five delectable young models appear at the party, during which the 80-year-old educator gets too excited and unfortunately kicks the bucket - but not before telling his pupils to fulfill his last wish and get a little naughty! The quintet of married men then takes it upon themselves to conquer the babes, all the while trying to evade the watchful eye of their wives (Maggie Cheung Ho Yee, Yeung Sze Man, Monica Chan, Mak Ling Ling, and Jacqueline Chong).

programme.title: The Lady Improper
programme.desc: Siu Man is divorced by her husband due to her fear of intimacy. After that, she wants to restart her life by taking over her fathers restaurant. Siu Man hires a new chef with unique culinary philosophy that revitalizes her. Tired of the shackles she placed on herself, Siu Man embarks on a journey of self-discovery and sexual liberation.

programme.title: Kung Fu Chefs
programme.desc: After being ousted from the clan, disgraced chef Wong encounters cooking prodigy Lung and takes him on as a new disciple in his new restaurant. With the Top Chef competition coming up, it's now up to Lung to reclaim his master's honour, even if the other side is not fighting fair

programme.title: From Vegas To Macau
programme.desc: Chow Yun Fat stars as "Magic Hands" Ken, a legendary gambling maestro who is forced out of retirement when his daughter's safety is compromised by an international gambling mafia. In order to save her, Ken and his new protg Cool must work together to expose the evil mastermind by challenging him to a high stakes head-to-head battle of cards.

programme.title: The Rescue
programme.desc: An emergency occurs on an offshore drilling rig that would cause it to capsize and sink. The Emergency Response Unit races against the clock in a chopper rescue mission amidst dangerous explosions and fire. Captain Gao Qian must work seamlessly with his chopper pilot Zhao Cheng to rescue survivors using the most maverick and dangerous tactics.

programme.title: The White Storm
programme.desc: Three Narcotics Bureau officers who are good friends get involved in a case with the drug lord. When the operation fails, they must make a devastating decision - two can live, but one must die. Five years later, the two vow to take revenge but end up competing against each other for their own lives. Will brotherhood be sacrificed again?

programme.title: Ah Boys to Men
programme.desc: Ken is a rich and spoiled young man reluctant to be enlisted into National Service but must do so by law. He has to endure harsh training but it is made more bearable when he befriends three other recruits. When his girlfriend breaks up with him, Ken tries all ways to escape from camp so as to chase her back, but this leads to dire consequences

programme.title: Knockout
programme.desc: A former boxing champion and convict who has just been released from prison discovers that his wife has died and he is now a single parent. The situation is made worse with his daughters diagnosis of leukaemia. In order to encourage his daughter and fulfil his promise of never giving up, he re-enters the boxing ring.

programme.title: Table for Six
programme.desc: In this comedy, three brothers reside in a home inherited from their late parents. The eldest brother insists they have dinner at home every night as a family, but tensions begin to rise when their girlfriends join in as well. Love, friendship, jealousy and complicated relationships are all on the menu for this table for six!

programme.title: Nezha
programme.desc: A former top team racing driver wants to prove himself in a race but accidentally hurts his teammate Lily, leading to the teams downfall. When an inexperienced virtual car racing champion joins the team and unexpectedly shines in a real-life race, can the three drivers team up to regain glory for their team?

programme.title: From Vegas to Macau III
programme.desc: Ken holds a wedding ceremony in Macau for his daughter Rainbow. However, an explosion during the wedding causes Rainbow to fall into coma, while Ken and his friend Mark, are accused of engulfing some illicit money. Enraged, Ken swears to seek vengeance and pursue the mastermind who has gotten them involved in his evil plan.

programme.title: Hello Mr. Billionaire
programme.desc: An incompetent soccer goalkeeper for a minor league suddenly inherits thirty billion yuan in this mind-boggling comedy. In order to get the full amount, he must first spend one billion yuan on himself in a month without telling anyone about the task, and is also not allowed to own any assets at the end of it.

programme.title: Raging Fire
programme.desc: As the police sets to arrest a drug lord, a team of masked thugs steals the drugs and murders the cops. Inspector Bong is devastated to see the aftermath of the carnage and soon discovers that the killers are led by Ngo, a former fellow cop who was forced into a life of crime by him. As the two men meet again, it is time to settle the score

programme.title: Concerto of the Bully
programme.desc: The story follows an internet songwriter Jamie, who is gifted with an extraordinary retentive memory. One day, she was kidnapped by Yung, a street punk, to a remote fish raft. In the hope to flee with the only ability she has, Jamie offers to give Yung a spiritual music therapy. The two who have nothing in common begin to form a bond through music.

programme.title: A Cool Fish
programme.desc: In this dark-comedy, cop-turned-security guard Ma faces the ultimate challenge when his boss mysteriously disappears and his paralyzed sister makes a morbid deal with the armed bandits who abduct her.

programme.title: Septet: The Story of Hong Kong
programme.desc: Seven of Hong Kong's most revered directors, all with distinctly unique styles, come together for the first time to compose a symphony of stories for their city from the 50s to the future.

programme.title: Genghis Khan
programme.desc: Before he became the great Khan he was known as Temjin, and was deeply in love with his childhood sweetheart Brte. News of Temjin's father's death disrupted their relationship and as Temjin heads back home, he faces a sudden attack from his father's former comrades, causing his whole tribe to be destroyed.

programme.title: Dummy Mommy, without a Baby
programme.desc: Fong Lai Kuen works at an advertising agency but is about to be sacked by her boss after offending him. She pretends to be pregnant so that the company cannot fire her, according to the labour law. Since then, Fong receives much care and love from her colleagues and begins to feel guilty about her lie as things develop out of her expectations.

programme.title: The White Storm 2: Drug Lords
programme.desc: In this epic action-thriller starring Andy Lau and Louis Koo, the two award-winning best actors star on opposing sides of a drug war. As a bounty of $100 million Hong Kong dollars is made to hunt down the biggest drug dealer in the city, Hong Kong becomes the battleground for the fight between good and evil.

programme.title: Cyber Heist
programme.desc: Hackers have caused a large-scale cyber attack, but luckily cyber security engineer Chun, manages to fend it off with his protective firewall system. To Chun's surprise, his boss is the mastermind of the attack, and when Chun gets trapped in a money laundering operation, he must fight against his boss in the cyber world to prove his innocence.

programme.title: Endgame
programme.desc: A killer and a stage actor accidentally swapped their identities at a bathhouse. The actor must complete the killers mission while the killer thinks he is a hopeless actor after losing his memory during the accident. When the killer strives to become a successful stage actor, he also starts to recall what has happened

programme.title: Detective Chinatown 3
programme.desc: After the events in Bangkok and New York, Tang Ren and Qin Feng are invited to solve a murder case in Tokyo, but it turns out to be a challenge for the worlds best detectives. While the case has become complicated and confusing since the worlds top detective Q got involved, a hilarious challenge for the best detectives in Asia has just begun

programme.title: The Italian Recipe
programme.desc: Famous pop idol Peng travels to Rome for a reality show and encounters an ordinary girl, Mang, who dreams of becoming a great chef after migrating to Italy. Peng and Mang have nothing in common but spend a magical night in Rome together. Their lives begin to change as the two start to fall in love.

programme.title: Chasing the Dragon
programme.desc: Infamous real-life drug kingpin Crippled Ho came to Hong Kong as an illegal immigrant in 1963 and ruthlessly built an empire from the chaotic underworld of drug dealers and corrupt police who ruled the city under notorious detective Lee Rock.

programme.title: The Flag of Iron
programme.desc: When super director Chang Cheh found new talent and blood with "The Five Venoms" actors, most of which were trained in the highly acrobatic Chinese opera and well versed with exotic martial arts weapons, this created a new spark for his use of bizarre weapons in his films. The Flag Of Iron is one of 20 movies that he directed featuring the utterly flabbergasting and physically exhausting action bits created by these five dudes. You have the good guys from the righteous clan versus the bad guys from the villainous clan and it's so filled with "don't-blink-or-you-will-miss-something" gags, you will need to watch it over and over again so you can see the things you missed.

programme.title: The Bride from Hell
programme.desc: A young business man marries a pretty and much sought-after young bride, not knowing that she carries the spirit of a girl raped by her uncle and murdered along with her parents. Justice must be done, and it ain't pretty!

programme.title: One-armed Swordsman
programme.desc: Accepted to the Golden Sword School after his father sacrificed his life to save his master, Fang Kang is resented by his fellow pupils and decides to leave. His master's daughter challenges him to a fight and cuts off his arm. Fang masters the art of sword fighting with one arm and finds himself returning to the School to save his master again.

programme.title: The Singing Escort
programme.desc: Betty Ting plays Susan, a young woman hiding from her father by being a nightclub singer in Japan. Pop singer Chao Ke-jen (Lin Chong) gets permission from his boss to visit Japan, with the condition that he finds the boss's daughter. Boy finds girl, boy falls in love. But will the father approve?

programme.title: The Imperial Swordsman
programme.desc: Fu is a government officer heading home after being charged with falsifying reports. En route, he encounters & recruits a skilled swordsman as a bodyguard. They then meet a fleeing bride and her maid who asked to join them for protection. When the group reach a ruined temple however, a gang of assassins appear and attack them

programme.title: Till the End of Time
programme.desc: This is Jenny Hu's stunning debut as a struggling singer who tries to keep her career and marriage intact. This movie also includes seven memorable hit songs.

programme.title: New Tales of the Flying Fox
programme.desc: In a great rendition of The Silver Fox and Legend of the Fox comes this exciting adventure, where the only thing between the clan leaders and certain death is Hui Ying-hung.

programme.title: Rose, Be My Love
programme.desc: Not a love triangle but a love 'rectangle', Rose, Be My Love is a romantic drama set on the eve of World War II that represents the high standards achieved by Shaw Brothers in both aspects of star power and technical polish.

programme.title: Shadow Girl
programme.desc: A young swordswoman becomes invisible during the day and a monster at night after taking her grandmas pill. She ruined the wedding of a bandit chiefs daughter using her powers and is hunted down by them for revenge. Will she escape the hunt?

programme.title: Facets Of Love
programme.desc: Set in the Ming Dynasty, the story revolves around a brothel and the girls who work there. The film begins by following the life of a girl from a poor family, who is sold by her mother to the brothel. While she is the most beautiful of the girls and attracts many clients, the girl hopes to escape this sad way of life one day.

programme.title: Sunset
programme.desc: Teenage heart-throbs Ching Li and Paul Chin Pei come across like Annette Funicello and Frankie Avalon in the musical Sunset, a musical romp that plays similar to one of Hollywood's famous "Beach Party" movies. A car load of girls meets a car load of boys, and Ching and Paul ultimately fall in love. Yet the film takes an acrid twist and turns out to be more like a Shakespearian tragedy than a beach-babe party.

programme.title: The Golden Knight
programme.desc: The heroine Yu Fei Xia is accused of stealing the book of martial arts secrets. To prove her innocence, she disguises herself as a man and finds her way into the Shaolin Temple to find out the truth...

programme.title: My Rebellious Son
programme.desc: The venerated Sun Chung made many different kinds of films for Shaw Brothers, including popular and renowned satirical comedies, contemporary action dramas, and magnificent martial arts movies. This is one of his last of the latter for the studio, so he wanted to have fun... and let the audience share it. Toward that end he cast international favorite Alexander Fu Sheng as the title character who keeps testing the patience (and kung-fu skills) of his father, a small town bonesetter and herbal healer played by award-winning character actor Ku Feng. But when a local dignitary not only smuggles drugs but plans to give a Chinese treasure away to evil outsiders, the father and son unite to take on foreign fighters and even Japanese ninja in a non-stop display of comic action prowess.

programme.title: Lady General Hua Mu-Lan
programme.desc: Mulan disguises herself as a male soldier to replace her aged father in a war against the barbarians. Her courage brings her victory in battles and she was promoted to a general. When Mulan returns home with glory, the chief commander asks her to marry his daughter, forcing Mulan to reveal her true identity.

programme.title: Two Champions of Shaolin
programme.desc: Set in the Qing Dynasty, the Shaolin clan wants to overthrow Qing and restore the Ming Dynasty, while the Wudang clan is backed by the Qing government. The two renowned clans eventually set themselves up against each other, and a series of vicious fighting has just begun

programme.title: The Dream of the Red Chamber
programme.desc: Adapted from the most widely read Ching Dynasty novel, this touching love story has proven a challenge to many filmmakers, and it is acclaimed as the most successful one. A sumptuous feature that took three years of planning and production, it was a hugely popular and critiqued hit which stands out as a classic combination of both 18th century literature and 1960s moviemaking.

programme.title: The Hidden Power Of Dragon Sabre
programme.desc: Defeated villain Sung Ching Shu returns and starts a reign of terror, trapping a beautiful Mongolian Princess and mastering the "yin and yang combination" to become almost invincible. Only two swords held by two great swordsmen can stand in his way!

programme.title: Mr Funny - bone
programme.desc: Join Mr Funny bone in a series of comic vignettes as he attempts to win the heart of a dashing lady. Along for the ride is his loyal sidekick Mr Big Potato, a stout fellow who is forever getting into silly mishaps. The pair gets involved in plenty of shenanigans and gags!

programme.title: The Kid With A Tattoo
programme.desc: Young Bao Tong witnesses the brutal murder of his kung fu master by a vicious villain. A large eagle tattoo on Baos chest was spotted by the killer as he escapes. Can Bao escape from the killer?

programme.title: Moonlight Serenade
programme.desc: A sweet inn-keepers daughter is witness to a perverted rape, leading to more danger than most romantic dramas can handle. Can her true love rescue her in time? For this movie, the moonlight serenade is the sound of suspense, leading to more danger than most romantic dramas can handle.

programme.title: Men From The Gutter
programme.desc: Two very different cops are out to capture a local drug boss. In this sizzling crime thriller, the two cops go about doing their jobs differently - one does everything to the letter of the law and the other just doing whatever it takes to solve crime.

programme.title: THE AMOROUS LOTUS PAN
programme.desc: Adapted from the renowned Chinese novel, The Water Margin, this is the story of a poor and beautiful girl Lotus Pan, who is raped by her master and had to be married off to a midget who treats her badly. Lost and lonely, Pan unwittingly becomes a pawn in the game of lust between her husbands playboy brother Wu Song, and a murderous man Men Ching.

programme.title: Lady Of The Law
programme.desc: Chan, the chief of Wan Sheng Escort, is forced to raise his opponents son, Yim. While Chan forbids Yim to practice martial arts, Yim secretly learns it. Ten years later, a rapist appears and Yim is arrested by a lady constable as the suspect. The rapist turns out to be Chans elder son and Yim is framed by the Chans. Can Yim prove his innocence?

programme.title: Passing Flickers
programme.desc: This film is an amusing insiders look at the Hong Kong film industry and is based on Director Li Han Hsiangs popular newspaper column recounting his work at Shaw Brothers. The collection of some of his funniest and most surreal film musings of the era, filled with behind-the-scene asides, this is a must-see for any Hong Kong cinema aficionado!

programme.title: The Black Tavern
programme.desc: This sword-filled thriller centres on The Black Tavern an inn where the down and dirty meet to plot nefarious doings. A bunch of villains are lured to the inn by a rumour about a valuable treasure being hidden there. After all the backstabbing and killings, they realise that it is a trap created to wipe them out once and for all

programme.title: Three Sinners
programme.desc: Based on the classic Ming Dynasty novel The Water Margin, Three Sinners is a Huangmei Opera about love, betrayal, murder, and redemption. Starring Hong Kong's premiere movie couple, it is one of the grandest Eastmancolor-Shawscope costume musicals in the Shaw Brothers library.

programme.title: Forever Diamonds
programme.desc: Hua, a pretty fraud, steals a brilliant diamond ring from a shop in Hong Kong and escapes to Singapore. To smuggle the ring pass customs, Hua slips it into the pocket of a stranger, Yen, but then lost track of him. Hua finally spots Yen after searching for days and does everything to get close to him in order to take the ring back.

programme.title: Legend Of The Fox
programme.desc: A young man, Chin, believes he is an orphan, until he meets three men and learns from them that his father was a great swordsman who was killed when he was trying to dispel rumors of a wrongdoing and return a lost sword to its rightful owner. Chin seeks out the mens help to take vengeance on the wrongful death of his father.

programme.title: The Emperor and the Minister
programme.desc: The ingenious imperial scholar Liu Yung always embarrasses Emperor Chien Lung with his quick wit and gift of gab. The emperor purposely sets him up to solve the seemingly unsolvable. However, Liu Yung resolves it easily with wit and style and foils the emperors plot once again.

programme.title: The Emperor and his Brother
programme.desc: The Emperor Qianlong is not the legitimate successor to the throne at birth, but he only learns the truth when two senior members of a subversive anti-government secret organisation contact him years later. As it happens, the chef of this organisation is Qianlongs younger brother and they must now confront each other in opposing roles

programme.title: The Mirror and the Lichee
programme.desc: The curious title in this Huangmei Opera romance refers to the two props that signal a happy beginning between a scholar and a local beauty. The scholar polishes mirrors so as to be closer to his love, who signals her approval by tossing him some lichees. From that point on the course of their love becomes rocky, complete with murder and suicide.

programme.title: Heads For Sale
programme.desc: Hua is an upright and brave swordswoman who will stand up against villains and do anything for Luo, the man she loves. When Luo is sent to jail by the corrupted police, she sets out to free him and did not hesitate to chop off two bodyguards heads. In the process, she also stumbles across an old enemy of her father who is back seeking revenge.

programme.title: The Yellow Muffler
programme.desc: Japanese director Inoue Umetsugu takes on the glitzy world of nightclub performers in The Yellow Muffler. The film depicts the struggle of two singing sisters, Ching-ping (Irene Chen I-ling) and Pai-hung (Betty Ting Pei) and ends when they are cast in a new movie.

programme.title: The Reckless Cricket
programme.desc: Inspired by Drunken Master, this kung fu comedy features a bumbling martial artist creating a cricket-style fighting arts to fight and defeat the different martial artists who have beaten him before.

programme.title: The Mad Monk
programme.desc: The movie consists of four stories of the Mad Monk helping others, from saving a mother and daughter from crumbling walls, to helping hawkers deal with bullies, recovering stolen money for a young man and punishing a devious court official and his son.

programme.desc: Emma vs Eddie and Alex - Dara Briain schools our sixth former contestants Emma, Eddy, and Alex as they take on this iconic trivia-based quiz for the chance to win some epic prizes! No phones allowed.

programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans S1 Ep11
programme.desc: Baitfish - The NCIS team investigates a deadly explosion at the Navy-Marine Corps Relief Gala event they were attending, but further examination reveals Pride was the intended target of the bomb.

programme.title: Dora and the Lost City of Gold
programme.desc: Along with a group of teens and Boots the Monkey, Dora embarks on a quest to save her parents while trying to solve the mystery behind a lost Incan civilization.

programme.title: Lara Croft Tomb Raider: The Cradle Of Life
programme.desc: Lara Croft faces her most perilous mission: to recover what ancient civilization believed to be the essence of all evil, Pandora's Box.

programme.title: Wedding March 3: Here Comes the Bride
programme.desc: Things get chaotic when Mick's sister decides to have her wedding at the Inn that weekend and Mick's daughter announces plans to drop out of college.

programme.title: Tad, The Lost Explorer And The Secret Of King Midas
programme.desc: Tad attend archaeologist Sara Lavroff's presentation of her latest discovery - the papyrus that shows the existence of the Necklace of Midas, the mythical King who turned everything he touched into gold.

programme.title: xXx: Return of Xander Cage
programme.desc: Xander Cage is left for dead after an incident, though he secretly returns to action for a new, tough assignment with his handler Augustus Gibbons.

programme.title: Alternatino with Arturo Castro S1
programme.desc: The Dreamer - An offhand comment during an interview lands Arturo in a pickle, Netflix faces an emergency, and an FBI sting goes wrong.

programme.title: Jack Reacher
programme.desc: A homicide investigator digs deeper into a case involving a trained military sniper who shot five random victims.

programme.title: Sarah Kohr: The Devil’s Moor
programme.desc: While driving with her mother, detective Sarah Kohr witnesses a robbery at a gas station and intervenes. After subduing the perpetrator who turns out to be just a 15-year-old, she has to investigate how he was able to get his hand on a live weapon.

programme.title: The Grump: In Search Of An Escort
programme.desc: The Grump, a stubborn old Finnish farmer, goes on a quest to find a replacement for his beloved second-hand car. He goes to Germany to do so, but ends up settling accounts with his past.

programme.title: Murder by the Lake - The Return
programme.desc: A man is found dead with a gunshot to his head, the bullet belonging to detective Hanna Zeiler, who is found unconscious next to him. Detective Oberlnder presumes murder, and their relationship is put to the test as he makes a life-changing decision.

programme.title: H Is For Happiness
programme.desc: In this quirky coming-of-age dramedy, Candice is a twelve year old girl with boundless optimism and happiness. Set in the quirky town of Albany, she sets out to conquer the trials of adolescence and bring love back into her broken family.

programme.title: Kuma
programme.desc: After being tricked into becoming the second wife of a Turkish man in Vienna, the nave Ayse accepts her fate and even develops a close friendship with Fatma, the first wife. With Fatma dying of cancer, Ayse has to take over her marital duties.

programme.title: Birth Of A Champion
programme.desc: In 1984 Germany, a hot-headed teenage Boris Becker has but one goal: to play tennis in the big leagues, and to be the best at it. Despite his temper, he is scouted by coach Gnther Bosch, who sees the future Wimbledon champion for what he is.

programme.title: Death Comes to Venice
programme.desc: When an art conservator mysteriously drowns in the Canale dei Marani in Venice, his widow Anna investigates the suspicious circumstances of his death. In the course of doing so, she is led into a jungle of lies, fraud, and art theft.

programme.title: Sarah Kohr: Ward
programme.desc: It is no coincidence that detective Sarah Kohr intervenes when the life-threatening attack on a Chinese businessman in Hamburg completely overwhelms his bodyguards. Sarah knows that her former colleague Lanz was behind it, but she needs to find out why.

programme.title: H Is For Happiness
programme.desc: In this quirky coming-of-age dramedy, Candice is a twelve year old girl with boundless optimism and happiness. Set in the quirky town of Albany, she sets out to conquer the trials of adolescence and bring love back into her broken family.

programme.title: The Order Of Things
programme.desc: Corrado, a policeman in charge of immigration control, meets a young Somali woman on a field assignment in Libya, who left her war-ravaged country to go to Europe. He finds himself having to make a choice between obeying his orders and saving her life.

programme.title: Murder by the Lake - The Return

programme.title: Murder by the Lake - The Mermaid
programme.desc: Two detectives investigate the death of a mermaid, Sybille Baumgartner, who was found beaten to death on the shore of Lake Constance. They suspect the killer was Matteo, a kite-surfer who left the crime scene with a knife in his abdomen.

programme.title: The Last Stop
programme.desc: A lone Commuter trapped in a speeding train has to push against the force of the speed and escape before it crashes into the LAST STOP.

programme.title: Rice Wine Chicken
programme.desc: A young woman struggles to accept the personality changes her grandmother is going through as she ages.

programme.title: Homicide Unit Istanbul: Taurus 1
programme.desc: When a bank adviser is found dead, fears of terrorist attacks drives Secret Service Officer Tarkan to ask the police for help. Inspector Mehmet zakin is sent to work with him to investigate a case laced with corruption, blackmail, and illegal trafficking.

programme.title: My Little Sister
programme.desc: Set in Russia during WWII, little Yamil impatiently awaits the day that his father, whom he has never seen, can return home from battle. One day, mother brings home a traumatized orphan girl Oksana. Yamil finds comfort and hope in loving her as a sister.

programme.title: Reunited
programme.desc: Two children live alone in Turkey. They are Syrian refugees whose parents are in Denmark and Canada, trapped in a bureaucratic system which reduces their interactions to Skype calls. Will they succeed in reuniting with their family?

programme.title: Sarah Kohr: Silent Death
programme.desc: In a sealed factory with the highest security precautions, the destruction of deadly substances is underway. However, the lead chemist is kidnapped along with a canister of Sarin gas - an invisible and odourless poison that kills within minutes.

programme.desc: When a Palestinian girl disappears, the Australian media jumps on the news like vultures. She is painted as an Islamic extremist who has joined ISIS. Her family vehemently denies the accusations as they struggle to cope with their grief and confusion.

programme.title: Aurora
programme.desc: In this black comedy, a sanatorium isolated in the mountains becomes a microcosm of Kyrgyzstan; its residents comprise of a tourist, a TV host, a pervert, Chinese businessmen and drugged-up youths. Excised in linear time, reality dissolves into fantasy.

programme.title: Sarah Kohr: Silent Death

programme.title: Murder by the Lake - Procession
programme.desc: Marlene Sthr is shot by a crossbow during the legendary blood procession with over 3000 horses and is on life support. Right before she was shot, she saw a precious racehorse presumed dead years ago. Two detectives are called to investigate.

programme.title: Homicide Unit Istanbul: Taurus 2
programme.desc: Inspector Mehmet zakinb narrowly survives a bomb blast in a caf thanks to the intervention of his colleague Mustafa. With two key figures in the current case dead from the blast, and the official narrative not adding up, Mehmet suspects foul play.

programme.title: Domingo I
programme.desc: The historic election of Brazilian president Luiz Incio Lula da Silva is seen from the perspective of a provincial bourgeois family. His inauguration deeply troubles the family, as they worry about their authority and wealth in this new administration.

programme.title: A Date
programme.desc: Fauzi tries to help his friend, To, with finding love on a dating app. Although initially reluctant, To warms up to the idea of the app and lands a date with his match, but soon realizes that he and his date werent entirely honest on the app.

programme.title: Above the Clouds
programme.desc: After losing his parents in a flood, 15-year-old Andy is forced to live in the Mountain Province with his estranged grandfather. Feeling theyve lost everything, the two embark on a journey and start to come to terms with their grief.

programme.title: Playmaker
programme.desc: A former footballer and jailbird, Ivo is no longer interested in football. That is until he meets Lukas, a talented young player, and decides to help him pursue a professional career. But his criminal past soon catches up with him.

programme.title: World's Dumbest S15 5
programme.desc: You have the right to remain stupid! TruTV brings you 20 of the dumbest outlaws ever to fight the law and lose. This perp walk includes a drunk driving squirrel, nude news crasher, grand theft puppy, and a stick-up woman whose bra is packing. Takingthese criminals to task is our celebrity cast, including Frank Stallone, Tonya Harding, Jared Logan, and Kevin McCaffrey.

programme.title: World's Dumbest S15 6
programme.desc: Knuckleheads, start your engines! TruTV is hitting the road with 20 of the dumbest motorheads ever to ignore traffic laws. You'll see a passed out pilot, road rage rants, a nearly-too-hot-for-TV motorcycle ride, and a mail truck that delivers a hit.Keeping the show on the road is our celebrity cast, including Danny Bonaduce, Leif Garrett, Mike Trainor, and Chris Fairbanks.

programme.desc: It's an end and a beginning in part 2 of the series finale, as Penny & Leonard try to keep a secret, Raj makes a new friend, and the gang travels together into an uncharted future.

Then, in a shipping store he has customers believing that impossible technology of the future has arrived, likea bowling ball that can be mailed in a flat box. Plus, he has a hotel guest questioning her identity when he swaps her ID, and stumps a valet when he does a disappearing act from his car.

Will it pay off with an unbelievable score, or will they be crying all the way to the bank?

programme.title: Batman Begins
programme.desc: As a young boy, Bruce Wayne watched in horror as his millionaire parents were slain in front of him a trauma that leads him to become obsessed with revenge. But the opportunity to avenge his parents' deaths is cruelly taken away from him by fate. Fleeing to the East, where he seeks counsel with the dangerous but honorable ninja cult leader known as Ra's Al-Ghul, Bruce returns to his now decaying Gotham City, which is overrun by organized crime and other dangerous individuals manipulating the system. Meanwhile, Bruce is slowly being swindled out of Wayne Industries, the company he inherited. The discovery of a cave under his mansion, along with a prototype armored suit, leads him to assume a new persona, one which will strike fear into the hearts of men who do wrong; he becomes Batman!!!

programme.title: A Nightmare On Elm Street
programme.desc: Don't fall asleep! Freddy Krueger returns to everyone's nightmares in this contemporary re-imagining of the Wes Craven horror classic. Watchmen's Jackie Earle Haley plays the razor-fingered iconic killer who haunts the dreams of teenagers and kills them in their sleep. As long as they stay awake, they can protect one another ... but once they fall asleep, there is no escape.

programme.desc: Q, Murr, Sal, and Joe provide a false sense of security to some sassy shoppers at a drug store, and the competition reaches new heights during a rematch of their balloon challenge in the grocery store. And tonight the guys laugh and cry their way through the first ever permanent punishment!

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S6 11
programme.desc: The guys cannonball into an uncomfortable poolside encounter, and convince strangers to press send on their absurd e-mails. Later, tonight's loser presents a shocking senior citizen initiative to a community planning board.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S6 12
programme.desc: It's foul play when the guys work stadium security! Then, the guys contaminate evidence during a crime scene investigation class. Plus, tonight's loser develops multiple personality disorder when opening for Legends in Concert.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S6 13
programme.desc: Joe, Sal, Q and Murr head to the casino to see if they can play their cards right as Blackjack dealers. Then they team up for a complex guessing game in the park and polish strangers' footwear to an imperfect shine. Tonight's loser takes a pounding on the mound at a Brooklyn Cyclone's game, but it's a mystery lover who is delivering the blows.

programme.title: Music And Lyrics
programme.desc: Hugh Grant and Drew Barrymore star as washed-up '80s pop star with a chance for a comeback and his quirky plant lady with a knack for lyrics. Alex Fletcher (Grant--Two Weeks Notice) has been reduced to working the nostalgia circuit at county fairs and amusement parks. The charismatic and talented musician gets a chance at a comeback when reigning pop diva Cora Corman (Haley Bennett) invites him to write and record a duet with her, but there's a problem--Alex hasn't written a song in years; he's never written lyrics . . . and he has to come up with a hit in a matter of days. Enter Sophie Fisher (Barrymore--Lucky You), Alex's beguilingly plant lady, whose flair for words strikes a chord with the struggling songwriter. On the rebound from a bad relationship with the newly famous novelist Sloan Cates (Campbell Scott--Duma), Sophie is reluctant to collaborate with anyone, especially commitment-phobe Alex. Now, Alex and Sophie will have to face their fears--and the music--to find the love and success they both deserve. Written and directed by Marc Lawrence, the writer of the Miss Congeniality films and the writer/director of Two Weeks Notice.

programme.title: Friends S8 6
programme.desc: Phoebe meets the friendly fianc? of her flighty twin, Ursula.

programme.title: Friends S8 7
programme.desc: Ross is happy to learn that pregnant Rachel wants to find her own apartment.

programme.title: Friends S8 8
programme.desc: Rachel nervously tells her father, Dr. Leonard Green that she is pregnant.

programme.title: Friends S8 9
programme.desc: In this Thanksgiving episode, special guest star BRAD PITT.

programme.title: Friends S8 10
programme.desc: Chandler becomes upset when Monica spends a fortune on a luxurious pair of black boots.

programme.title: Storage Hunters S4 11
programme.desc: Brandon goes out on a limb, and finds himself sinking in quicksand with no help from Lori - will Desert Dan lend him a hand? Dan's car smarts come in handy, while T Money rocks out with his win. Will Scott and Chrissy climb to the top, or fall hard in today's auction?

programme.title: Storage Hunters S4 12
programme.desc: Scott blows his wad on an Oktoberfest bin, and will have to drown his sorrows. The Alvarado Brothers bid big on collectibles -- will they draw a wild card? T Money rides away with a big win, while Brandon and Lori investigate a crime scene bin. Willeveryone make it out of the auction alive?

programme.title: Storage Hunters S4 13
programme.desc: Sean holds a one of a kind auction in Malibu, at the Rolls Royce of storage facilities. T Money needs a robot -- but does that mean he'll get it? Jesse draws on his pinball skills to outwit his competitors, while Brandon and Lori take one of the biggest gambles of their career. Will it pay off with an unbelievable score, or will they be crying all the way to the bank?

programme.title: The Flash S9 4
programme.desc: With the power out in the city, Team Flash calls upon the Rogue Squad to help as Iris is visited by an old friend. Joe and Cecile work on finding a balance.

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect S1 1
programme.desc: Posing as a technician, Michael literally "gets the bug out" of a customer's phone and has him convinced it was in there all along. Then, as a seemingly ordinary bartender, he makes patrons fall for a never-ending beer bottle and a shot that breaks the laws of physics. Plus, he infiltrates an office and has gullible coworkers believing that he can freeze-dry animals and reanimate them.

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect S1 2
programme.desc: Posing as a cashier, Michael makes a shopper's face appear on a milk carton and tries to convince her that she really is a missing person. Then, in a shipping store he has customers believing that impossible technology of the future has arrived, likea bowling ball that can be mailed in a flat box. Plus, he has a hotel guest questioning her identity when he swaps her ID, and stumps a valet when he does a disappearing act from his car.

programme.title: Red Riding Hood
programme.desc: Valerie is a beautiful young woman torn between two men. She is in love with a brooding outsider Peter, but her parents have arranged for her to marry the wealthy Henry. Unwilling to lose each other, Valerie and Peter are planning to run away together when they learn that Valerie's older sister has been killed by the werewolf that prowls the dark forest surrounding their village. Father Solomon, a famous werewolf hunter, warns that the wolf, who takes human form by day, could be any one of them. As the death toll rises with each moon, Valerie begins to suspect that the werewolf could be someone she loves. Panic grips the town as Valerie discovers that she has a unique connection to the beast.

programme.title: The Golden Compass
programme.desc: Based on the first volume in Philip Pullman's best-selling, award-winning trilogy, His Dark Materials, THE GOLDEN COMPASS unfolds an epic fantasy adventure set in a parallel world, where science and magic intertwine.Twelve-year-old Lyra Belacqua (played by newcomer Dakota Blue Richards) sets out to rescue her best friend, and ends up on an extraordinary quest to save not only her own world, but ours and others as well. Academy Award winner Nicole Kidman and stars with Daniel Craig in this triumph of the imagination. Filled with fascination, depth and wonder, Pullman's saga presents the eternal struggle of good vs. evil -- and the power of one young girl heal a rift torn in the fabric of the universe.

programme.title: Jumanji: Welcome To The Jungle
programme.desc: In the brand new adventure Jumanji: Welcome to the Jungle, the tables are turned as four teenagers are sucked into the world of Jumanji.

programme.title: Charlie's Angels S3 Ep02
programme.desc: Angels In Vegas - Part 2 - Dean Martin is unnerved by the violent deaths of his closest friends. When showgirl Mary Phillips is killed in a mysterious car crash, the Angels fly to Vegas and go undercover at the Tropicana.

programme.title: M*A*S*H S10 Ep13
programme.desc: Blood and Guts - Clayton Kibbee, a handsome, worldly and renowned war correspondent, arrives at the 4077th with the intent of doing a story on the six pints of blood donated to the war effort by some of his readers. Kibbee decides to fictionalize the story of the first pint of blood in order to enliven it. When Hawkeye overhears what is going on he is livid, and points out that this is not a glorious escapade. When the fighting moves and the flow of casualties is lessened, a drunken Kibbe steals B.J.s newly restored motorcycle and takes his remaining pints of blood with him in search of more battling and perhaps a more dramatic story for the wire. Kibbee crashes during his alcoholic haze and is so severely injured as to need a pint of his own blood. The irony of the situation is not lost on the unfortunate journalist.

programme.title: The Jeffersons S2 Ep12
programme.desc: George's Alibi - During a severe snowstorm, Lionel accidentally dents George's company van, but he won't tell him because he took it without his father's permission. But George later thinks that he himself dented the van in a hit-and-run he thinks he caused.

programme.title: Cheers S4 Ep20
programme.desc: Save The Last Dance For Me - Carla teams up with her snarly, ex-husband, Nick, to enter a local dance contest. After several arguments during practice they split and she takes Sam as her partner competing against Nick and Loretta.

programme.title: Charmed S6 Ep02
programme.desc: Valhalley of the Dolls Part II - Phoebe and Paige search for Leo after Paige accidentally causes a "chipper" Piper to have amnesia, but the sisters soon learn he is being held on the mythical Island of Valhalla.

programme.title: Charlie's Angels S3 Ep03
programme.desc: Angels Come Home - A forged cablegram summons Jill to high-speed adventure. A garage explosion spells trouble. Suspicion rests on Jill's fiance Steve Carmody.

programme.title: Charlie's Angels S3 Ep04
programme.desc: Angel On High - Wheelchair-bound Jonathan Stambler learns that Joan Freeman has died in rural Caine's Corners. Bosley and the Angels find Joan's house stripped of evidential materials, and a courthouse fire destroys important documents.

programme.title: M*A*S*H S10 Ep14
programme.desc: Holy Mess, A - A depressed soldier goes AWOL and ends up at the 4077th in the company of Hawkeye and B.J. They discover that the soldier, Gillis, had just found out his wife was having an affair and acted impetuously. The next morning they take him to Sunday service to talk to Father Mulcahy. When the M.P.s come to arrest Gillis, Father Mulcahy extends him sanctuary. When Potter informs Gillis that the Command Chaplain has decreed that the sanctuary is to be denied in this situation, Gillis pulls a gun, only to be disarmed by a soft-spoken Father Mulcahy.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit S8 Ep15
programme.desc: Haystack - An overzealous reporter accuses a new mother on television of kidnapping and trying to kill her baby. This turns out to be the last straw for the despondent woman, who promptly commits suicide.

programme.title: The Jeffersons S2 Ep12
programme.desc: George's Alibi - During a severe snowstorm, Lionel accidentally dents George's company van, but he won't tell him because he took it without his father's permission. But George later thinks that he himself dented the van in a hit-and-run he thinks he caused.

programme.title: Hawaii Five-O S1 Ep07
programme.desc: The Ways of Love - Steve McGarrett has himself committed to a California prison in order to obtain information linking the disappearance of a priceless jewel collection, to the mysterious death of a girl. Knowing his cellmate was the boy friend of the dead girl, McGarrett helps him break out of prison.

programme.title: Bewitched S3 Ep10
programme.desc: I'd Rather Twitch Than Fight - Darrin is furious when Samantha gives his checked sport jacket, bought before he was married, away. Meanwhile, Louise, lectures Samantha on the importance of clothing and the gifts married couples exchange.

programme.title: Frasier S1 Ep10
programme.desc: Oops - When Frasier contributes to the rumor mill, he causes Bulldog to lose his job.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit S8 Ep16
programme.desc: Philadelphia - When Benson investigates a rape case outside her jurisdiction, she finds herself being questioned by the local Police Captain and although she gets some answers, some are difficult to accept.

programme.title: The Jeffersons S2 Ep13
programme.desc: George And The Manager - When the manager of one of George's stores quits, longtime employee Emily campaigns to replace him. But George shows his male chauvinism by refusing to consider her because she is a female.

programme.title: Cheers S4 Ep21
programme.desc: Fear Is My Co-Pilot - When the pilot of a small airplane collapses while in flight, passengers Sam and Diane think they are about to die, and in their panic reveal their true feelings for each other.

programme.title: Charmed S6 Ep03
programme.desc: Forget Me... Not - The Cleaners kidnap Wyatt and erase his existence, after the child accidentally brings a dragon to life. When Piper, Phoebe and Paige regain their memories they relive the day Wyatt was kidnapped.

programme.title: Northern Exposure S3 Ep17
programme.desc: My Mother / My Sister - Shelly's visiting mother attempts to pass Shelly off as her older sister; Adam experiences symptoms of sympathetic pregnancy for Eve.

programme.title: Northern Exposure S3 Ep18
programme.desc: Wake Up Call - Maggie meets an enigmatic stranger; Marilyn's cousin, a healer, observes Joel to learn about conventional medicine; Shelly begins shedding her skin.

programme.title: Northern Exposure S3 Ep19
programme.desc: Final Frontier - Holling (John Cullum) must confront unresolved feelings when his old nemesis, Jesse the bear, is found dead; an influx of Japanese tourists annoys Maurice (Barry Corbin). With Doug Ballard and Don R. McManus.

programme.title: Northern Exposure S3 Ep20
programme.desc: It Happened In Juneau - Joel and Maggie (Rob Morrow, Janine Turner) are forced to share a hotel room when she flies him to Juneau for a medical conference; Chris' (John Corbett) brother (Richard Cummings Jr.) returns from Africa.

programme.title: The Casebook Of Sherlock Holmes Ep01
programme.desc: The Disappearance of Lady Frances - Watson writes to Holmes telling him of the other guests at his hotel in the Lakes. Sailing back from church across the lake, Lady Frances Carfax falls out of the boat and is rescued by a mysterious person.

programme.title: The Casebook Of Sherlock Holmes Ep02
programme.desc: The Problem of Thor Bridge - Maria Gibson, finding only rejection from her husband, arranges to meet the children's Governess, Grace Dunbar, at Thor Bridge. Maria is shot on the bridge and Grace is accused of her murder.

programme.title: Charmed S5 Ep23
programme.desc: Oh My Goddess Part II - Now all-powerful goddesses, the Charmed Ones must try to not be seduced by their new powers and stay focused on vanquishing the Titans before the Titans can destroy all the whitelighters and elders.

programme.title: Charmed S6 Ep01
programme.desc: Valhalley of the Dolls Part I - Phoebe and Paige search for Leo after Paige accidentally causes a "chipper" Piper to have amnesia, but the sisters soon learn he is being held on the mythical Island of Valhalla.

programme.title: Hawaii Five-O S1 Ep03
programme.desc: Tiger by the Tail - A kidnap hoax and publicity stunt by a young rock 'n' roll singer who decides his career needs a publicity boost backfires when his father offers a huge reward for his return.

programme.title: Hawaii Five-O S1 Ep04
programme.desc: Samurai - Five-O goes into action when a Honolulu racket boss, Tokura, runs into serious difficulty with a secret Japanese society. McGarrett must protect Tokura even though he is trying to convict the racket king for his underworld activities.

programme.title: Hawaii Five-O S1 Ep05
programme.desc: Twenty-Four Karat Kill - Steve McGarrett and his Five-O crew discover that a fishing boat owner is smuggling gold bars into the islands. Johnny Fargo, owner of the tuna boat, and his brilliant but cynical attorney lead the Five-O unit on a fast chase through downtown Honolulu.

programme.title: Frasier S1 Ep06
programme.desc: The Crucible - Frasier is furious when he learns that his newest art purchase is actually a fake.

programme.title: Frasier S1 Ep07

programme.title: Frasier S1 Ep08

programme.title: Dater's Handbook Ep
programme.desc: - - - Cass is a successful business woman who appears unsuccessful in her personal life and decides to try "Dater's Handbook" at her sister's encouragement; she dates several guys to test the process.

programme.title: Bewitched S3 Ep06
programme.desc: Endora Moves in for a Spell - Uncle Arthur pops out of a painting in the Stephens home. Samantha tells him she is trying to stop Endora from encouraging Tabitha to use her witchcraft.

programme.title: Bewitched S3 Ep07
programme.desc: Twitch or Treat - Darrin is incensed when Endora makes a house appear near the Stephens home for a Halloween party. When Samantha begs her mother to remove the house, Endora decides to hold her party in the Stephens home.

programme.title: Bewitched S3 Ep08
programme.desc: Dangerous Diaper Dan - Diaper Dan, secretly working for the A.J. Kimberly Adver-tising Agency, gives Samantha a baby rattle. Samantha, proud of Darrin's creative ability, describes his ad campaigns to Endora.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit S8 Ep12
programme.desc: Outsider - Fin reluctantly works with a Brooklyn detective who thinks that Fin's rape cases are connected to his unsolved murder cases.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit S8 Ep13
programme.desc: Loophole - A photograph of a dead boy found in an anonymously delivered envelope leads Dets. Fin and Munch to the apartment building that houses the crime scene.

programme.title: Cheers S4 Ep17
programme.desc: Second Time Around - Sam tries to help Frasier out of a severe depression by fixing him up with "a girl who can show him a good time." After just one date with Candi, Frasier announces his plans to marry her immediately.

programme.title: Cheers S4 Ep18
programme.desc: Peterson Principle - Norm has to struggle with his conscience when he and a co-worker are in competition for a big promotion, and Norm hears gossip that could win him the job and destroy the other man.

programme.title: Shogun S1 Ep05
programme.desc: Part 5 - A British sea captain becomes an honored Samurai after being shipwrecked in 17th century Japan. An epic mini-series that is a blend of politics, romance, history, culture, religion and high adventure.

programme.title: The Jeffersons S2 Ep09
programme.desc: George Won't Talk - George is excited about being invited to speak in front of some youths about his success at what he believes is a college--until he discovers that he's to speak in the Harlem neighborhood where they used to live.

programme.title: The Jeffersons S2 Ep10
programme.desc: George's Best Friend - George's Navy pal, Wendell Brown, pays him a visit. However, Wendell is more interested in getting fresh with Louise than in reminiscing old times with George.

programme.title: The Jeffersons S2 Ep11
programme.desc: Jenny's Grandparents - Jenny's stubborn grandfathers won't set foot in the Willis apartment because of Tom and Helen's mixed marriage, so Jenny and Louise try to orchestrate a meeting on neutral ground - in the Jefferson apartment.

programme.title: The Jeffersons S2 Ep12
programme.desc: George's Alibi - During a severe snowstorm, Lionel accidentally dents George's company van, but he won't tell him because he took it without his father's permission. But George later thinks that he himself dented the van in a hit-and-run he thinks he caused.

programme.title: The Jeffersons S2 Ep13
programme.desc: George And The Manager - When the manager of one of George's stores quits, longtime employee Emily campaigns to replace him. But George shows his male chauvinism by refusing to consider her because she is a female.

programme.title: Northern Exposure S3 Ep21
programme.desc: Our Wedding - The town prepares for Adam and Eve's (Adam Arkin, Valerie Mahaffey) wedding; Maggie (Janine Turner) is angry when she learns Joel (Rob Morrow) tricked her into believing they slept together while in Juneau.

programme.title: Northern Exposure S3 Ep22
programme.desc: Cicely - Through flashbacks, a 108-year-old former resident (Roberts Blossom) recalls the history of Cicely, founded in 1909 by two women (Yvonne Suhor, Jo Anderson) who envisioned a Utopian community. With Janine Turner.

programme.title: Charlie's Angels S3 Ep01
programme.desc: Angels In Vegas - Part 1 - Dean Martin is unnerved by the violent deaths of his closest friends. When showgirl Mary Phillips is killed in a mysterious car crash, the Angels fly to Vegas and go undercover at the Tropicana.

programme.title: Charlie's Angels S3 Ep02
programme.desc: Angels In Vegas - Part 2 - Dean Martin is unnerved by the violent deaths of his closest friends. When showgirl Mary Phillips is killed in a mysterious car crash, the Angels fly to Vegas and go undercover at the Tropicana.

programme.title: The Casebook Of Sherlock Holmes Ep03
programme.desc: The Adventure Of Shoscombe Old Place - John Mason comes to see Holmes with his worries about the goings on a Shoscombe Old Place. There has been peace and love between his master and his widowed sister but all has changed for the worse.

programme.title: The Casebook Of Sherlock Holmes Ep04
programme.desc: The Boscombe Valley Mystery - A man is found dying beside a mere by his son, who is later charged with his murder. The love of a young girl persuades Sherlock Holmes to try and clear the young man.

programme.title: Charmed S6 Ep02
programme.desc: Valhalley of the Dolls Part II - Phoebe and Paige search for Leo after Paige accidentally causes a "chipper" Piper to have amnesia, but the sisters soon learn he is being held on the mythical Island of Valhalla.

programme.title: Charmed S6 Ep03
programme.desc: Forget Me... Not - The Cleaners kidnap Wyatt and erase his existence, after the child accidentally brings a dragon to life. When Piper, Phoebe and Paige regain their memories they relive the day Wyatt was kidnapped.

programme.desc: The Pensive Doll - The fight between Suisho and Kuon intensifies. Kuon tells Shingetsu and Mangetsu to leave the area for their safety.

programme.title: Granbelm Ep11
programme.desc: Even If My Goodbye Doesnt Reach You - Troubled by her existence, Mangetsu meets Kuons sister, Shisui. She speaks with her and is moved by their conversation.

programme.title: Granbelm Ep12
programme.desc: Magiaconatus - Shingetsu and Mangetsu enter the final battle. Suisho is determined to prove that no one is qualified to win the battle.

programme.title: Life With An Ordinary Guy Who Reincarnated Into A Total Fantasy Knockout Ep3
programme.desc: A Guy Who Reincarnated As A Fantasy Knockout And An Angry Elf - Tachibana and Jinguji destroy the hideout of the bandits. But the flame burns down the forest of elves.

programme.title: Life With An Ordinary Guy Who Reincarnated Into A Total Fantasy Knockout Ep4
programme.desc: A Guy Who Reincarnated As A Fantasy Knockout And A Dark Swordsman - Tachibana and Jinguji arrive at a city. Jinguji is challenged by a swordsman who comes from the same province as he is!?

programme.title: Life With An Ordinary Guy Who Reincarnated Into A Total Fantasy Knockout Ep5
programme.desc: A Guy Who Reincarnated As A Fantasy Knockout And Armor That Moves - Schwartz is summoned to this world, just like Tachibana and Jinguji. To prove that he accepts a mission.

programme.title: Life With An Ordinary Guy Who Reincarnated Into A Total Fantasy Knockout Ep6
programme.desc: A Guy Who Reincarnated As A Fantasy Knockout And A Free Spirit - With Schwartzs skill, Goddess appears and tells the reasons why she reincarnated Jinguji into the fantasy world.

programme.title: Best Of Animax Ep1
programme.desc: Best Of Animax - Enjoy a variety of curated content specially from Animax.

programme.title: Woodpecker Detective’s Office Ep3
programme.desc: Casual Remarks - Takubokus friends join him in solving the murder. However, all their speculations are debunked by a boy named Taro.

programme.title: Woodpecker Detective’s Office Ep4
programme.desc: Strange Stories Of The High Tower - Takuboku meets his old friend Yamaoka while working to solve the mystery of repeated ghost sightings in Asakusa.

programme.title: Strike The Blood Fourth Ep1
programme.desc: Ova - Kojou tries to recall how he and Yukina woke up together in the same room.

programme.title: Strike The Blood Fourth Ep2
programme.desc: Paladiness Of Mirage I - Kojou, the Fourth Progenitor, wakes up on a beach with no memory of the events that led him there. how he got there.

programme.title: Strike The Blood Fourth Ep3
programme.desc: Paladiness Of Mirage II - Yukina appears to Kojou and takes him away from Castiella.

programme.title: Strike The Blood Fourth Ep4
programme.desc: Paladiness Of Mirage III - Kojou begins to learn about the background of the island and how he survived being speared by Yukina.

programme.title: Yashahime: Princess Half-Demon Ep3
programme.desc: The Dream Butterfly - Towa liberates her family from a gang of bullies, but now she has to defend them from a demon brought from the past.

programme.title: Yashahime: Princess Half-Demon Ep4
programme.desc: The Gateway To The Past - Moroha finds a way back to the Feudal Age, where she strikes a deal with Root Head which she intends to break.

programme.title: Yashahime: Princess Half-Demon Ep5
programme.desc: Jakotsumaru Of The Red Bone Palace - Towa, Setsuna and Moroha set out to confront Jakotsumaru, who gathers human skeletons to revive his father Tokotsu.

programme.title: Yashahime: Princess Half-Demon Ep6
programme.desc: The Cat Juan At The Old Temple - While investigating some disappearances at a mountain pass, the trio meet a girl abandoned by her mother.

programme.title: In/Spectre Ep5
programme.desc: A Monster Of The Imagination - Kotoko realizes that the person fighting with Steel Lady Nanase is none other than Kuro. Saki finds them and learns about Kuros past.

programme.title: In/Spectre Ep6
programme.desc: Logical Fiction - Kotoko deduces that Steel Lady Nanase is created from the imagination of people. To defeat her, she uncovers the truth behind Karin Nanases death.

programme.title: In/Spectre Ep7
programme.desc: Preparing To Conquer The Steel Lady - Detective Terada has been killed by Steel Lady Nanase. Kotoko is determined to defeat her tonight and prevent anymore victims.

programme.title: In/Spectre Ep8
programme.desc: She Who Spins Fiction - Saki recalls her encounter with Kuros cousin Rikka. Saki thought that she has already died, but Kotoko tells her otherwise.

programme.title: Next Level Chef S2 Ep15
programme.desc: Finale - Chefs Gordon Ramsay, Nyesha Arrington and Richard Blais recruit talented chefs and take them under their wings as they face unique cooking challenges in a one of a kind culinary gauntlet with the goal of finding the food world's newest superstar.

programme.title: The Masked Dancer U.K. S2 Ep4
programme.desc: Five of the masked dancers, Pearly King, Onomatopoeia, Tomato Sauce, Sea Slug and Cactus, return to the stage to perform a new routine. Two will face each other in a dance off with one eliminated and unmasked.

programme.title: TMZ No BS - Britney Spears: Divorce & Despair
programme.desc: The lies that led to some of the biggest stories in Hollywood history are exposed by TMZ.

programme.title: TMZ No BS - Conor McGregor
programme.desc: Conor McGregors unprecedented ascent to superstardom caught everyone by surprise. The very formula that turned him into one of sports biggest success stories may also ultimately lead to his downfall.

programme.title: TMZ No BS - Harry And Meghan
programme.desc: Exploring one of the most combustible relationships in royal history.

programme.title: 30 Rock Ep8
programme.desc: The Break-Up - Liz finally calls it quits with Dennis (guest star Dean Winters) while personal politics pit Toofer against Tracy.

programme.title: Magnum PI ('18) S4 Ep8
programme.desc: A Fire in the Ashes - Magnum starts following Higgins to discover what shes been hiding, as shes secretly assigned to infiltrate a group threatening to take down MI-6.

programme.title: Magnum PI ('18) S4 Ep9
programme.desc: Better Watch Out - A Christmas Eve ransomware attack on the Honolulu Police Department forces Lia to reveal a family secret to Magnum and Katsumoto.

programme.title: Got Science? S1 Ep5
programme.desc: Your Health and More - One could be mildly interested in the topic of health or a bracketed health conscious cookie - this episode has something for everyone. It has a bouquet of stories that are current and relevant, curated to pique interest.

programme.title: Got Science? S1 Ep6

programme.desc: Emptiness - British comedian and travel enthusiast Griff Rhys Jones explores the prairies and vast sprawling plains of both Saskatchewon and Alberta provinces and discovers they reveal riches from fossils to farmland.

programme.title: Brian Cox's Adventures in Space and Time S1 Ep3
programme.desc: What is Gravity? - Brian takes us on a tour of gravity, explaining how Sir Isaac Newton devised a simple formula to describe gravity as a force that governs both how apples fall and how planets move in the heavens.

programme.title: Got Science? S1 Ep7
programme.desc: Animals and Us - This episode explains the fascinating concept of cute aggression where animals evoke extreme emotions in human beings.

programme.title: Got Science? S1 Ep8
programme.desc: Science of Travel - People are travelling like never before. There is a rise in frequent flyers and no one wants to spend their weekends at home any more. This episode aims to cater to a world that's always on its feet.

programme.title: Wild Metropolis S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Residents - Cities may seem unlikely havens for wildlife, but for animals able to adapt, the urban world is filled with opportunity. This first episode examines what it takes for wild animals to thrive in the fastest changing habitat on the planet.

programme.title: Coast New Zealand S2 Ep5
programme.desc: Christchurch - Scottish historian and archaeologist Neil Oliver flies a kite, investigates the origins of the New Zealand accent and goes in search of a toxic arachnid with a tortured love life.

programme.title: The World's Deadliest Weather S3 Ep6
programme.desc: A tornado traps teachers in America, wildfires rip across England, a landslide hits hikers in Argentina, and a man descends into a deadly volcano.

programme.title: Running Wild with Bear Grylls S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Deion Sanders - The retired footballer travels to the southern Utah desert after his kids accuse him of softness. They hike through the desert, but Deion's fear of snakes causes problems when they encounter one in the wild.

programme.desc: Canada - It's deep into the Canadian wilderness for this week's challenge: searching for the White Sturgeon, the biggest freshwater fish in North America.

programme.desc: Protecting Primates - Today, more than half of the world's primates are under threat of extinction. Meet the scientists making groundbreaking discoveries about this remarkable animal family.

programme.title: Race Across the World S3 Ep3
programme.desc: The five pairs leave Dawson City and head south to the third checkpoint, the Rocky Mountain resort town of Banff. This time, the team arriving in last place will be eliminated from the race.

programme.title: Griff's Canadian Adventure S1 Ep5
programme.desc: Emptiness - British comedian and travel enthusiast Griff Rhys Jones explores the prairies and vast sprawling plains of both Saskatchewon and Alberta provinces and discovers they reveal riches from fossils to farmland.

programme.title: Changing Planet S2 Ep1
programme.desc: In the second year of a seven-year project, six presenters chart the fight to save the planet's endangered ecosystems. In this episode, we visit the Maldives, USA and Greenland.

programme.title: Greta Thunberg: A Year To Change the World S1 Ep3
programme.desc: As the world is brought to a standstill by the COVID-19 pandemic, Greta has to put her plans on hold. The pandemic reveals the enormity of the challenge that tackling climate change poses.

programme.title: Climate Change: Ade On The Frontline S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Scandinavia - For the final leg of his journey, Ade heads to Scandinavia. Starting in the frozen islands of Svalbard and heading through Sweden and Denmark, he sees how winter temperatures have risen by an astonishing amount in the Arctic.

programme.title: Nomads of the Serengeti 1 Ep4
programme.desc: Snows of Kilimanjaro - Mt. Kilimanjaro is the highest freestanding peak in Africa, it has five separate climatic zones. Jean Du Plessis is making his first climb to the peak. His mission is to see whether climate change is affecting the snow on the top of the mountain.

programme.title: Orangutan Jungle School 1 Ep4
programme.desc: The Misfits - Theres watery fun with group two as they visit group threes flooded classroom. Ayu, Ruthie, and Kesi take a step closer to release. And the arrival of Alba - the worlds rarest orangutan - creates a sensation at Orangutan Jungle School.

programme.title: Beasts of the Big Blue 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Otago Peninsula/ Muaupoko - Set sail for New Zealands Otago Peninsula, a breeding refuge for endangered seabirds and marine mammals. Watch as sea lions, albatrosses, red-billed gulls, white-fronted terns, and fairy prions find mates, then nurture the next generation.

programme.title: Chasing the Rains 1 Ep3
programme.desc: Praying for Rain - Trail Anastasia as her herd splits to protect two precious elephant calves, while Kuleta retakes territory for her remaining cheetah cubs. Join wild dog Phoenixs search for a new mate as the skies open up and rain begins to heal the parched land.

programme.title: Chasing the Rains 1 Ep4
programme.desc: The Inside Story - Look behind the scenes and meet the innovative teams working to preserve and protect Kenyas wildlife. Check out Save the Elephants radio-tracking-collar system, a drone that monitors wild dog packs, and a local team of Maasai cheetah trackers.

programme.title: Baby Animals 2 Ep6
programme.desc: Primate Families - The sprawling primate family includes animals as different as monkeys, lemurs and humans. Follow primate babies to see how they bond with their mothers, learn to socialize, and adapt to an ever-changing environment.

programme.title: Into the Wild India 1 Ep8
programme.desc: Temple Monkeys on the Run - Nestled on the edge of the ancient city of Jodhpur, the luxurious Temple Gardens are home to a huge troop of Hanuman Langurs, who enjoy a peaceful life of bounty. But the troop has a strict hierarchy.

programme.title: Tales from Zambia 2 Ep5
programme.desc: The Valley of the Birds - Zambias Luangwa Valley is home to Africas biggest and most fearsome giants, but what really makes it special are its birds. There are over 400 different species here; each perfectly adapted to exploit every opportunity on offer.

programme.title: Nomads of the Serengeti 1 Ep3
programme.desc: Ngorongoro - Explores the Ngorogoros highlands and caldera on the edge of the Serengeti. The caldera is a wildlife haven that some have called a modern day Eden because of the density and diversity of its wildlife. That includes some of the last of Africas tuskers.

programme.title: Nomads of the Serengeti 1 Ep4
programme.desc: Snows of Kilimanjaro - Mt. Kilimanjaro is the highest freestanding peak in Africa, it has five separate climatic zones. Jean Du Plessis is making his first climb to the peak. His mission is to see whether climate change is affecting the snow on the top of the mountain.

programme.title: Wild Dogs: Running with the Pack 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Meet the Packs - Connect with the three packs: the large Manzi pack in the lush heartland, the Kakuli pack in the Badlands, and the tiny Stork Colony pack living at the parks edge. Follow Julz as he shares their victories and defeats in this make-or-break season.

programme.title: Nomads of the Serengeti 1 Ep3
programme.desc: Ngorongoro - Explores the Ngorogoros highlands and caldera on the edge of the Serengeti. The caldera is a wildlife haven that some have called a modern day Eden because of the density and diversity of its wildlife. That includes some of the last of Africas tuskers.

programme.desc: Snows of Kilimanjaro - Mt. Kilimanjaro is the highest freestanding peak in Africa, it has five separate climatic zones. Jean Du Plessis is making his first climb to the peak. His mission is to see whether climate change is affecting the snow on the top of the mountain.
